text: That's the picture. The boy is taking cookies from the cookie jar, giving one to his sister, also falling off the stool he is on. The mother is washing dishes, letting the sink overflow, getting all over the floor. I see nothing. The girl is saying be quiet, but that can't. I don't know what the mother gets by standing in the water. That's all I see. Okay, thank you. What have I missed? you
